use_cases_desc:
- Audio-track mixing
- interactive board game
- trading desk in financial computing
- visual analytics across wall of tablets
contribution_desc: A new modular hardware platform for linking multiple mobile devices to easily create novel cross-device workspace environments.
interaction_techniques: Data transfer/sharing; UI distribution; Remote control; Visualisation
tracking_characteristic: Tracking devices only; Contact; Positioning left/right; Inside-out tracking
crossdevice_def: "Cross-device setups allow people to use interfaces that span across several interconnected tablets, phones and other devices"
